text: Hagi Jeremaiaga vahe kamo'zama kantahige'za, nahigeno Ra Anumzana tagri Anumzamo'a amazana hunerante? hu'zama hanagenka amanage hunka zamasamio. Tamagrama mopatamifima mani'neta Anumzamofona tamefi hunemita, ru vahe'mokizmi havi anumzante monora hunte'naze. Ana hu'nazagu menina ru vahe mopafi umani'neta ana vahe'mokizmi eri'za eri zamantegahaze hunka zamasamio.
